ai_description: A roll of pink and white patterned cleaning cloths featuring a wavy line design. The non-woven viscose rayon material is wound around a brown cardboard core. The product packaging shows a white label with purple, blue, green, and orange accents, clearly displaying the OKS brand, quantity (30 pieces), and dimensions (35cm x 25cm). One image shows a cloth held in hand against a white surface with household items in the background, demonstrating its soft texture and practical size for cleaning tasks.
